name: tm59
effect: Teaches Dragon Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Incinerate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dragon Pulse)

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
